titleStmt.title: The statutes vvhiche the iustices of peace, mayres, shyryffes, baylyffes, constables, & other officers were of late commaunded by the Kynges Maiestye to put in execution, on peyne of His Graces moste hyghe indignation and displeasure
Laws, etc.
